last_episode_to_air.name: The Kingdom of Cherry Blossoms
last_episode_to_air.overview: Will the festival be a success? Will Mr. Kadota make it back in time for the play? What will Yoshino do when her contract expires?

name: Sakura Quest
overview: Five girls work in the tourism bureau of their small provincial town. The town revives its "micro-nation" tourism program, which originated from a nationwide movement during Japan's bubble economy period, and hires the five girls as "monarchs" (tourism ambassadors).

episodes.name: Off to Magical Manoyama
episodes.overview: After being rejected in over 30 job applications, Yoshino Koharu finally gets an offer. She probably should have read the contract more carefully...

episodes.name: The Gathering of the Five Champions
episodes.overview: Yoshino faces her first trial as queen: sell one thousand boxes of the tourist board's mistakenly-ordered snacks before their expiration date is up!

episodes.name: The Cry of the Mandrake
episodes.overview: Yoshino investigates the town's passion for kabura, which leads to a strange showdown between their two kabura-based mascots!

episodes.name: The Lone Alchemist
episodes.overview: The Queen and her Ministers come up with some exciting ideas to promote Manoyama wood-carving! Unfortunately, not all of the locals are thrilled.

episodes.name: The Budding Yggdrasil
episodes.overview: Yoshino recruits a local artist to help the team design a big project for Manoyama Sculpture. Meanwhile, Sanae reflects on her work and its meaning.

episodes.name: The Rural Masquerade
episodes.overview: A film crew has arrived to film a zombie movie.  The Tourism Board attempts to cater to their demands while turning it into an opportunity to promote the town wherever possible.  Maki is having issues with her own aspirations as an actress.

episodes.name: The Mansion in Purgatory
episodes.overview: The movie shoot and all the activity in town forces Maki to further reflect on her acting aspirations, as well as her relationship with her father.

episodes.name: The Fairy's Recipe
episodes.overview: Yoshino and the Ministers struggle to find the right dish for their new C-Rank Gourmet plan. Meanwhile, Shiori finds that her sister has a mysterious relationship with an old classmate.

episodes.name: The Lady's Scales
episodes.overview: Shiori reveals her plan to bring together the Board of Merchants and the Tourism Board, along with the rest of the town.

episodes.name: The Dragon's Soft Spot
episodes.overview: The singles in the local Community Club organize a matchmaking tour with women from the city, with Yoshino and the Ministers as tour guides.

episodes.name: The Forgotten Requiem
episodes.overview: The matchmaking tour continues! Meanwhile, Ririko investigates the tale of the town's dragon, and discovers some new things about herself in the process.

episodes.name: The Dawn Guild
episodes.overview: Yoshino and the Ministers prepare for the Kingdom of Chupakabura's Founding Festival, and are repeatedly surprised at who signs on to help out!

episodes.name: The Marionette's Banquet
episodes.overview: The day of the Founding Festival finally arrives. Will the help of the TV network pay off? How will it change Manoyama?

episodes.name: The Queen, Convicted
episodes.overview: It's summer break! Yoshino reunites with old friends and family when she visits her hometown. Maki and Sanae go back to Tokyo, while Shiori and Ririko work on a B and B proposal.

episodes.name: The Queen's Return
episodes.overview: A group of Spanish cryptid enthusiasts visit Manoyama in search of the Chupakabura. Meanwhile, Yoshino and the others work to find b and b's for Manoyama.

episodes.name: The Harlequin on the Pond
episodes.overview: Ushimatsu's desperate attempts to pull something from the pond reveal a dark past.

episodes.name: The Sphinx's Antics
episodes.overview: The Ministers begin their search for the festival treasures, and introduce some of the more remote seniors to the Internet.

guest_stars.character: Old Man Gen / Old Man Masa (voice)
guest_stars.name: Cho

episodes.name: Minerva's Saké Saucer
episodes.overview: The seniors of Warabiya stage a revolt against the Kingdom of Chupakabura, and the Queen herself is taken hostage!

episodes.name: The Foggy Folklore
episodes.overview: Maki receives a reply about her application for a role in a movie, and must once again reflect on her dreams. Meanwhile, Yoshino tries to figure out how the town can use one of their old, shut-down schools.

episodes.name: The Phoenix in the Holy Night
episodes.overview: The Ministers open up an old school to serve hot lunch, and come up with a new plan to promote the old building when that doesn’t go so well.

episodes.name: The Pixie in the Town of Ice
episodes.overview: Erika attempts to escape from Manoyama, but ends up staying with the Ministers. Meanwhile, Yoshino and Sanae try to gather support from shop owners for the Mizuchi Festival revival.

episodes.name: The New Moon Luminarie
episodes.overview: Erika continues her stay with the Ministers, and Shiori tries to convince her that Manoyama isn't such a bad place. Also, the hunt for the Golden Dragon comes to an exciting conclusion!

episodes.name: The Crystal of Melting Snow
episodes.overview: Yoshino receives an offer from an Manoyama alumni to open a branch of the highly successful Belem bakery in the town.  Many of the owners in the shopping district are unwilling to give up store space, as they still live above.  Meanwhile, Kadota informs everybody of some unfortunate news.

episodes.name: The Eternal Obelisk
episodes.overview: Dark rumors of civic plotting abound as the revival of the Mizuchi Festival draws near.

episodes.name: The Kingdom of Cherry Blossoms
episodes.overview: Will the festival be a success? Will Mr. Kadota make it back in time for the play? What will Yoshino do when her contract expires?
